text: Sare solofere yi a yiifanni, silanfan xɛnxɛn dɛ firin kanna yi minima a dɛ,1.16 Silanfan xɛnxɛn dɛ firin kanna a fe mato Heburune 4.12 kui. Alaa falan sama silanfanna ma bayo a sɛnbɛn gbo a sɔndɔmɛn nun niin yɛtɛɛn fatama e bode ra, a e kɛɲaan fɛsɛfɛsɛ. Efɛsi 6.17 fan mato. Alaa falan findixi silanfanna ra a Nii Sariɲanxin xa. Silanfanna, sofane yɛngɛ so dɛgɛmaan na a ra. a yɛtagin yi mayilenma alo soge xɔlɛna yanyi tagini.
